PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03042021-04-19,  NR,  CRA,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Non-application of Presumption – Declaration of Female Parent)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NON-APPLICATION OF PRESUMPTION - DECLARATION OF FEMALE PARENT) in order to allow a female parent to waive the female presumption in right of an ‘other’ parent (being male or gender-neutral), as opposed to only a male parent.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0082 Publication Date: 2021-04-28
AttachmentsAttachment
